## Course goals



## Prerequisits

This workshop requires no previous experience with R.
It is expected that you have installed R and RStudio on your computer prior to the workshop.

Instructions on how to [download and install R](https://cran.r-project.org/) at CRAN.

Instructions on how to [download and install RStudio](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/).
Select the free RStudio Desktop version.


## Learning Objectives:

Learning Objectives: • Develop Experimental Designs for Soilborne Diseases • Evaluate Benefits and Shortcomings of Sampling Strategies • Data Analysis for Experimental Designs and Sampling Strategies Discussed


## How did we make this?

This site is hosted on GitHub and was created using RMarkdown.
The files used to create the site are available at the [APS_IntroR_2020 site](https://github.com/knausb/soilborne_disease_analysis).
